abstract: Pacific Gas & Electric, Northern California’s major utility, is announcing a commitment on Wednesday to make one of the largest ever solar power purchases.
snippet: Pacific Gas & Electric, Northern California’s major utility, is announcing a commitment on Wednesday to make one of the largest ever solar power purchases.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, July 23 — Pacific Gas & Electric, Northern California’s major utility, is announcing a commitment on Wednesday to purchase 550 megawatts of solar power to be generated by troughlike arrays of mirrors spread over nine square miles in the Mojave Desert.

headline.main: California Utility Agrees to Buy Power Generated by Solar Array
headline.print_headline: California Utility Agrees to Buy Power Generated by Solar Array

byline.original: By Felicity Barringer and Matthew L. Wald
